body.name: ECHOGEAR Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount Bracket for TVs Up to 90" - Low Profile Design Holds TV Only 2.25" from Wall - Fast Install with Template & Level After Mounting - Pull Strings for Cable Access
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 25 - 28 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SLIM DESIGN: Get your big TV on the wall with this low profile bracket. This puppy supports screens up to 85" and has pull strings to make accessing cables behind your TV easier than ever. Now get back to your Nic Cage film marathon.

FAST INSTALL: 3-step install is done in less than 20 minutes. We even threw in a slick wall template that shows you exactly where to drill. After install your TV clicks into place for safety that is surprisingly satisfying.
EASY LEVELING: Level the screen after you're done installing. Sub-par geometry skills won't take you down this time! Adjusts +-5º to make crooked TVs a thing of the past.

HORIZONTAL ADJUSTMENTS: Put your large TV exactly where you want it. Slide the bracket left or right on the wall plate to center it perfectly. Now you'll get the best view of John Wick's incredible hand-eye coordination.
UNIVERSAL MOUNTING: Designed and safety-tested right here in 'Merica. A comprehensive hardware pack ensures compatibility. Works with all major TV brands like TCL, Samsung, Vizio, & more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SLIMply the Best What's the point of a flat TV if it's not... well, flat? Holding your TV just 2.25". from the wall, this ultra-low profile mount is perfect for SLIMple setups built around straight-on or mostly straight-on viewing. Worried about cable access? Don't worry - we thought that one through. (That's what they pay us for, after all.) Just pull down on the bracket strings for easy TV removal or port access. It really doesn't get much SLIMpler than that! We're Easy Like That You've got a simple setup and you need a simple mounting solution. What's the definition of counterproductive? Said simple mounting solution being hella hard to install. And that's exactly why we made sure ours is the opposite, installing in just three easy steps: Mount wall plate, attach TV brackets, hang TV. Oh, and did we mention you can knock it all out in less than 20 minutes? Yep. That's real life, and our handy, dandy installation manual breaks it all down in straightforward, easy-to-follow instructions. Level After Install Getting it right the first time? In theory, that sounds great. In reality? It just doesn't happen all that often. That's why this super slim, low-profile mount was designed to be leveled even after the wall plate was installed. Just grab a screwdriver. Armed with that and just an easy twist of the hand, you can kiss unwanted crookedness goodbye. (As opposed to wanted crookedness, apparently? That's just lazy writing. Our bad.) The Perfect Fit You get a mount! And you get a mount! And you, and you - everyone gets a mount! Because if you're looking for a TV mount, there's a good chance this one will fit. Including hardware compatible with a laundry list of today's hottest brands - Samsung, Sony, Vizio, TCL and so many more - this low profile mount is universally designed to work for most flat panel TVs weighing up to 150 lbs. Want to make sure it'll work with yours? Check it out! If your TV's VESA pattern is on this list, it'll fit: 200x100, 200x200, 200x300, 200x400, 300x200, 300x300, 400x200, 400x300, 400x400, 600x200, 600x300, and 600x400. Not sure of your TV's VESA pattern? That's ok. Go to our website and find the MountFinder Tool at the top of the page. Once you enter your TV model number, you'll have a list of compatible mounts in just seconds. It's like magic! But really, just really, really, really good coding. Thanks, Echogear web nerds. We heart you.

You're Going To Want This Mount Mount? What Mount? Give your TV the spotlight with this low profile TV mount. It'll hold your screen just 2.25" from the wall, and the mount essentially disappears. Big TV? Bring It On. Upgraded to that beautiful 90" TV? This thing has the muscle to hold it up, and the hardware to ensure compatibility. It's built to work with basically all TVs from 42"-90". Level It Up Had a few beers before installing? Not great at geometry? We get it. Sometimes the mount just isn't quite level after install. Luckily you can adjust it 5º down or up for the perfect finish you promised your wife.

Original Version Upgraded Version TV Size 32"-85" 40"-90" Pull String Removal Yup You Better Believe It Center On Wall Yes Woo! Level After Mounting You Know It Install Wall Template Can I Get A Hell Yeah?

TV Size Range 32"-85" 42"-90" 40"-90" 40"-86" 43"-82" 42"-90" Tilt ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Swivel 10º 140º 130º Extension 5.8" 19" 22" Easy Install Tempate ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wall Type Wood Stud, Concrete, & Steel Stud Wood Stud, Concrete, & Steel Stud Wood Stud, Concrete, & Steel Stud Wood Stud, Concrete, & Steel Stud Wood Stud & Concrete Wood Stud & Concrete Fits Stud Spacing 16" - 24" 16" - 26" 16" - 24" 16" - 24" 16" - 17" 16" or 24" Center Mount Between Studs ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Life Changing ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount, seems sturdy
reviews.reviewText: We used it for a 75 inch tvEasy to assemble and mount.Seems sturdy enough to hold the tv even in times of light earthquakes, lol. That’s a possibility in the San Francisco Bay Area and I consider this choosing this mount. I would t use it if I wouldn’t t trust it to hold the tv at a “normal” earthquake. Anything more and the house will be damaged anyway and the tv is the last of my worries.I like that there are screws to adjust the level of the tv.I did t need to use them but good to have.Overall great value for the money. We just wish we could along the up/down angle a little since we mounted the tv above the fire place.There would be a way to do that but that would require me to remove a screw from the bracket and I rather have the stability instead of the tilt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Quick and easy to install, quality is on point and the mount is very rigid once installed on the wall. I used some small ledger bolts instead of the supplied screws or anchors. I definitely recommend mounting to the wall studs instead of using the included wall anchors. The frame itself is not rigid until fully fastened to the wall, due to this I suspect that wall anchors installed to drywall will loosen over time when adjusting, removing/installing the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT MOUNT for large TV's
reviews.reviewText: I know, everyone is looking for a low price for TV mounts these days. I was too when I selected this particular mount and company. Boy, did I get SO MUCH MORE than I paid for -- hopefully Echogear won't see this post and raise their prices.First of all, you get everything you would expect from a TV mount - my TV is 77" so I needed something that was sturdy for the job. The mount is sturdy and mounts easily regardless of wood/concrete block/metal studs. The mount allows for you to install it as close to center as you can and still adjust the TV from left to right to fully center after installation (to accommodate for stud placement, etc). Brackets lock on the mount so that the TV will stay once installed. All of this should be expected from any mount.For the unexpected, the instructions and box graphics were really good. Why is the important? To me, if they are going to put extra time in placing humor in the instructions to encourage you to actually read them and dress the packing up with graphics, etc., then that tells me they pay attention to details which is what I want when I put a $2,500 TV on the wall.However, the best feature I was not expecting was the ability to adjust the tilt of the TV once it is installed on the wall. With the larger TV's, even a small tilt in the mount creates a significant tilt on the TV once it is mounted. Once that initial mount is attached to your wall, it is very difficult to make any permanent adjustments with other mounts. The brackets that attached this mount to the TV have adjusters that can assist with those fine-tuning adjustments so that the TV is level once you are finished. Absolutely the best feature of this product and something I will look for in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. I have an older tv so it’s a lot heavier. Was very easy to install and seems very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. It is a well made mount, strong and works great for my 85” inch TV. The leveling feature is amazing, I was able to adjust the level of the TV easily after mounting it. Takes about 30 minutes to install and has a very minimal presence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great for hanging my tv!!
reviews.reviewText: I love having my light weight 55" LG tv hanging on the wall! I got this one because it was a great value and it's extremely strong, this holds it solidly in place it doesn't change position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ECHOGEAR an Excellent Large Screen TV Mount
reviews.reviewText: FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS PROVIDED , be a guy.... And I must say that ECHOGEAR has a great sense of humor too... This TV mount is sensational , extreme easy to install and after install it is adjustable to cover any of your mistakes, The instructions are well written , The hardware supplied is more than adequate, and this mount even comes with a template you can tape onto the wall for accurate measurements. We installed the mount for an 85 inch 110 pound TV , Install was 30 minutes on a wood wall with wood studs. A very solid mount and very close to the wall for a neat appearance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install. Great value.
reviews.reviewText: Went up easily and holds my 85" tv perfectly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Para tv de 75 pulgadas en panel
reviews.reviewText: Estoy sumamente satisfecha con el soporte para TV que adquirí recientemente para mi pantalla de 75 pulgadas. Opté por este soporte debido a la necesidad de instalar mi televisor en el panel de madera detrás del mueble, evitando el riesgo asociado con montajes en paredes de pladur y evitando que se caiga la tele con las patas al tener niños pequeños y un mueble bajo.La robustez y estabilidad de este soporte son notables. Se siente sólido y confiable, proporcionando una base segura para mi televisor de gran tamaño. La instalación no fue del todo sencilla...Una característica que realmente valoro de este soporte es su accesibilidad. Aunque no ofrece función de giro, permite un fácil acceso a la parte trasera del televisor para conectar dispositivos como USB y otros accesorios. Esta conveniencia añadida ha mejorado significativamente mi experiencia de uso.En resumen, este soporte para TV ha cumplido con creces mis expectativas al proporcionar una solución segura y funcional para montar mi televisor de 75 pulgadas en un panel de madera. Lo recomendaría sin dudarlo a quienes buscan un soporte confiable que permita un fácil acceso a la parte trasera del televisor y evite los riesgos asociados con las paredes de pladur.
Dopo 2 anni ancora regge la mi aTV da 75 pollici, è facile da installare e ha tutto il kit all'interno, l'ho montato in 5 minuti.

Bardzo dobry uchwyt. Gorąco polecam. Łatwy montaż. Gruba, solidna blacha. Uchwyt na bardzo dużą nośność. Powieszony telewizor 70 cali wisi stabilnie. Z racji rozmiaru telewizora uchwyt zamontowałem na 8 śrubach zamiast na 4 które są dostarczone w opakowaniu. Po założeniu telewizora można w niewielkim stopniu regulować jego pozycję. Z pewnością kupiłbym ponownie!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well packaged, clear instructions, well made, wall template to aid fitting provided, was worth paying a little extra.
Sehr kompakt gut beschrieben und einfach zu montieren!Das Produkt ist definitiv zu empfehlen
